mapper.insert: insert into request(rno, rdate, rstaff, rqty, rprice, rstate, bcode) values(seq_request.nextval, sysdate, #{rstaff}, #{rqty}, null, 1, #{bcode})
mapper.select: SELECT R.RNO, B.BCODE, B.BNAME, B.BPUBLISHER, R.RDATE, R.RSTAFF, R.RQTY, R.RQTY*B.BPRICE "R.RPRICE", R.RSTATE FROM REQUEST R JOIN BOOK B ON B.BCODE = R.BCODE ORDER BY R.RDATE DESC
select RNO, RSTAFF, RQTY, RSTATE, BCODE from REQUEST where rno=#{rno} ORDER BY RDATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REQUEST SET RNO=#{rno}, RQTY=#{rqty}, RSTATE=#{rstate}, BCODE=#{bcode} WHERE RNO=#{rno}
